reauth.gui.auth.title: ReAuthentication Screen
reauth.gui.button.save.tooltip: WARNING: Anyone with access to your config file may be able to extract and decrypt the stored profile.
reauth.retry.disabled: Login with saved Profile and retry
reauth.msauth.code.success.close: You may now close this page
reauth.msauth.code.fail.cancelled: Authentication with Microsoft was cancelled at your request
reauth.msauth.code.fail.server: Authentication with Microsoft is temporarily unavailable
reauth.msauth.code.retry: Please click here to try again
reauth.msauth.code.error.http200: Error: This is not an error!?
reauth.msauth.code.error.http404: Error: This resource does not exist
reauth.msauth.code.error.http415: Error: Authentication data has invalid format
reauth.msauth.step.microsoft.code.await: Please check your Browser to login
reauth.msauth.step.xsts: Authenticating with Xbox Live Token Service
reauth.error.unknown:
An unknown error occurred
Please try again
reauth.error.network:
Unable to reach authentication servers
Check your connection and try again
reauth.error.expired:
Saved Profile has expired
Please login again
reauth.error.crypto:
Saved Profile is corrupted
Please login again
reauth.error.xbox:
No Xbox Account found
Please verify you used the correct Account
